mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study ( study_seat_id, study_user_id, study_user_name, study_start_time, study_end_time ) VALUES ( #{study.studySeatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{study.studyStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{study.studyEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
